title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4122.7 - Time for wagering to close
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4122.7 - Time for wagering to close

State Regulations

All wagering shall stop as soon as the word "go" shall be
given either by record or by voice of the starter. Where vending machines for
the sale of pari-mutuel tickets are used, they shall be electrically locked by
the presiding judge from the judges' stand. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4122.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
